Don't want to fight?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Battles & Tournaments: Don't want to fight?
By Wild Garuda on Saturday, March 2, 2002 - 05:26 pm:

I was trainig my beaklon in Brillia for a while, and the little boy came over, I asked if he wanted to fight, and he said something like, " No, not right now." This is when the boy is smiling and is confident and visits regularly.Has anyone else noticed this?

By AgMasamu on Saturday, March 2, 2002 - 07:37 pm:

Rivals don't always accept fights from you. For example, Date often refuses to battle against me.

If your monster has a strong advantage (at least according to Fleria) over the other, your rival also tries to convince you not to fight.

By Wild Garuda on Sunday, March 3, 2002 - 03:27 pm:

Ah, thanks. Because just today, when I was about to fight the shy lady, she tried her best to convince me not to fight her.

By AgMasamu on Sunday, March 3, 2002 - 05:29 pm:

Some rivals seem to refuse battles more than others. Gadamon and Rip/Rap never turn down a fight, most likely because of their grudge against Fleria. Date rarely fights me, simply asking to fight at a later date. Haz seems to have about a 50/50 chance of fighting, as half the times I've tried to fight him, he claims that his mosnter isn't in a fighting condition.

Oh, and your rival will usually try to convince you not to fight by saying something like "Do you really wanna fight with THAT monster?".
